Dear REAL EMIRATES LLC,

 

As a part of our constant endeavor to enhance the level of service provided to our valued customers, we are pleased to inform you that we are now sending the policy documents along with invoice copy by e-mail. This will benefit you by receiving the policy documents quickly and in a convenient manner.

 

Please find attached your policy documents along with the copy of invoice.

As a part of our constant endeavor to enhance the level of service provided to our valued customers, we are pleased to inform you that we are now sending the policy documents along with invoice copy by e-mail. This will benefit you by receiving the policy documents quickly and in a convenient manner.

 

Please find attached your policy documents along with the copy of invoice.

 

In case you require a hard copy of the policy documents, kindly let us know either by replying to this e mail for

 

-          Motor insurance on E mail address motor@nascodubai.com <mailto:nonmarine@nascodubai.com>  or by calling us on +9714 3518610. 

 

-          Life insurance on E mail address grouplife@nascodubai.com <mailto:lgrouplife@nascodubai.com>  or by calling us on +9714 3051645.

 

-           Marine cargo insurance on E mail address marine@nascodubai.com <mailto:marine@nascodubai.com>  or by calling us on +9714 3051701.

 

-          Other class of business on E mail address nonmarine@nascodubai.com <mailto:nonmarine@nascodubai.com>  or by calling us on +9714 3051680. 

 

We will continue our efforts in keeping our commitment to deliver the best quality service to all our clients.

 

With assurance of best services at all times.

 

Best regards,

 

Underwriting department.

 



 

 

Nasco Gulf
P.O. Box 26590, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 8610  F +971 4 351 8710 

www.nascodubai.com <http://www.nascodubai.com/>
